articles.description: After plunging, its shares look attractive. The company is drawing crowds with its plush, high-tech driving ranges.
articles.content:
Fans of 
Topgolf Callaway Brands
 ,
 one of the few pure-play golf stocks, think it can deliver the investment equivalent of a hole-in-one. But lately, the performance of its shares has resembled … [+6169 chars]
